amendment.description: To facilitate cooperative agreements for wildlife services programs of the Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service of the Department of Agriculture.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2106 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2106 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Craig. (consideration: CR S14008-14009; text: CR S14009) To facilitate cooperative agreements for wildlife services programs of the Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service of the Department of Agriculture.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2106 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Craig.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2106 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
